description: Present/Future Value Calculator, separate frequencies for payments and interest, ability to email everything on the info page, use dates to set the period, set payments for beginning or end of period** T-Money for webOS provides an understandable and presentable method for performing financial planning functions covering loans, savings, retirement, insurance planning tools, and advanced profit and loss analysis as well as other standard functions. Using only a webOS device, T-Money gives opportunity for plenty of "what if" scenarios for planning for yourself or a client, displaying a graphical views of your finances and allowing you to view and email amortization schedules and other related materials. T-Money includes many advanced features including real estate estimated payment calculations, interest-only loan support, inflation adjusted calculations, and the ability to save and restore various calculator states all from within a highly customizable user interface. Sound Expressions is committed to customer support and satisfaction. Therefore, if you have any suggestions, comments, or questions, feel free to contact the developer! With your help, T-Money will continue to grow and further benefit its customers.
